name: Urban Cement Grey
description: Perfect for minimal homes and loft-style apartments, this tile mimics polished cement with a soft matte finish.

name: Mountain Slate Stone
shortDescription: Textured natural slate for rustic floors.
description: Add rugged charm to any floor with this stone-inspired slate tile, great for both indoor and outdoor use.

name: Classic Beige Marble
shortDescription: Elegant marble tones for premium floors.
description: A timeless marble design in beige, ideal for living rooms and entrance halls looking for sophistication.

name: Vintage Wood Oak
shortDescription: Warm wooden texture in tile form.
description: Capture the look of real oak floors without the upkeep. Great for bedrooms and cozy interiors.

name: Polished Ivory Shine
shortDescription: Luxurious shine in soft ivory tone.
description: This vitrified tile with a polished finish adds brightness and elegance to any modern flooring.

name: Desert Sand Matte
description: Inspired by desert sands, this matte tile blends with nature-inspired or rustic spaces beautifully.

name: River Pebble Texture
description: Bring nature indoors with this textured ceramic tile that mimics river stones – great for wet areas and balconies.

name: Onyx Black Gloss
description: Make a statement with this sleek, high-gloss onyx black tile – ideal for modern kitchens and showrooms.

name: Carrara White Marble
description: With soft grey veins, this tile emulates classic Carrara marble for elegant floors in any space.

name: Ashwood Grain
shortDescription: Subtle wood pattern for cool-toned floors.
description: Ash-toned wood-look tile perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, or Scandinavian-style interiors.

name: Frosted Ice Ceramic
shortDescription: Light blue ceramic with glossy finish.
description: Cool and refreshing, this tile suits spa areas, light-toned bathrooms, or elegant foyers.

name: Vintage Terracotta
description: Add rustic charm with this classic red-brown tile – perfect for balconies, patios, or heritage-style homes.

name: Graphite Stone Blend
shortDescription: Dark stone tile for bold interiors.
description: Add strength and drama to your flooring with this natural stone-look tile in a dark graphite shade.

name: Almond Gloss Vitrified
shortDescription: Soft creamy gloss for classic floors.
description: Neutral and inviting, this vitrified tile gives any room a polished, finished look with easy maintenance.

name: Stone Grey Lines
description: This tile adds texture and style through its fine line design, perfect for modern or office floors.
